paper_abstract: We provide an extended formulation of size for the cyclic polytope with dimension and vertices , . First, we find an extended formulation of size for . Then, we use this as base case to construct small-rank nonnegative factorizations of the slack matrices of higher-dimensional cyclic polytopes, by iterated tensor products. Through Yannakakis's factorization theorem, these factorizations yield small-size extended formulations for cyclic polytopes of dimension .
paper_title: Small Extended Formulations for Cyclic Polytopes
